alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:02PM MST until July 19 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN PIMA COUNTY... At 501 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ryan Field and Tucson Estates, or 10 miles west of Tucson, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Drexel Heights, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Saguaro National Park West, Valencia West, Summit, Tucson Estates, San Xavier Mission and Ryan AirField. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
